live_updates: Our team is on site along BC Hydro working on repairs. We thank you for your patience!
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54739.summary: Some customers in Langley Township are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54739.title: Nov 2 - Langley Township | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
54756.summary: Some customers in the North West area of Vermillion are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54756.title: Nov 2 - Vermillion (North West area) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
